com.sheepguru.aerodrome.api

Interface IAPIResponse

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IJetAPIResponse
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    APIFailure, APIResponse, JetAPIResponse

    public interface IAPIResponse
    Represents a response from some API
    Author:
    John Quinn

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getContentLength()
      Retrieve the content length
      javax.json.JsonObject getJsonObject()
      Retrieve the response as a parsed JsonObject
      org.apache.http.ProtocolVersion getProtocolVersion()
      Retrieve the protocol version
      String getResponseCharsetName()
      Retrieve the response content character set name
      String getResponseContent()
      Retrieve the response content
      org.apache.http.StatusLine getStatusLine()
      Retrieve the status line
      List<org.apache.http.Header> headers()
      Access the response headers list
      boolean isFailure()
      Find out if the last request was a failure Code is 400-599
      boolean isJson()
      A crude way to see if a response might have json in it.
      boolean isRequestFail()
      Find out if the last request was a failure due to client input.
      boolean isServerFailure()
      Find out if the last request returned a 500 range error.
      boolean isSuccess()
      Find out if the last request was successful
      void setContent(String content, String charset)
      Set the HTTP response content and character set.

    • Method Detail

      • getContentLength

        int getContentLength()
        Retrieve the content length
        Returns:

      • getJsonObject

        javax.json.JsonObject getJsonObject()
                             throws javax.json.JsonException,
                                    javax.json.stream.JsonParsingException
        Retrieve the response as a parsed JsonObject
        Returns:
        response
        Throws:
        javax.json.JsonException - if a JSON object cannot be created due to i/o error (IOException would be cause of JsonException)
        javax.json.stream.JsonParsingException - if a JSON object cannot be created due to incorrect representation

        boolean isFailure()
        Find out if the last request was a failure Code is 400-599
        Returns:

      • isJson

        boolean isJson()
        A crude way to see if a response might have json in it. Checks to see if a { is in position 0.
        Returns:
        might be json

      • isRequestFail

        boolean isRequestFail()
        Find out if the last request was a failure due to client input. Code: 400-499
        Returns:
        is fail

      • isServerFailure

        boolean isServerFailure()
        Find out if the last request returned a 500 range error.
        Returns:
        is server failure

      • isSuccess

        boolean isSuccess()
        Find out if the last request was successful
        Returns:
        request successful

        charset - character set name
